activities: Yardi Systems, Inc. is a leading provider of asset and property management software for the real estate industry.  Yardi Cloud Services allows businesses to concentrate on their core capabilities while leaving the management of servers, databases, and applications to Yardi’s IT department.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Property management data which includes data regarding the leasing and management of property including occupancy, vacancy, account balances, lease expirations, ledgers, revenue, budgets, expenses, valuations, pricing, and tenant information.
